00026 #ifndef NOISEPP_CURVE_H
00027 #define NOISEPP_CURVE_H
00028 
00029 #include "NoisePipeline.h"
00030 #include "NoiseModule.h"
00031 
00032 namespace noisepp
00033 {
00035         struct CurveControlPoint
00036         {
00038                 Real inValue;
00040                 Real outValue;
00042                 bool operator< (const CurveControlPoint &p) const
00043                 {
00044                         return inValue < p.inValue;
00045                 }
00046         };
00047 
00048         typedef std::vector<CurveControlPoint> CurveControlPointVector;
00049 
00050         template <class PipelineElement>
00051         class CurveElementBase : public PipelineElement
00052         {
00053                 protected:
00054                         ElementID mElement;
00055                         const PipelineElement *mElementPtr;
00056                         CurveControlPoint *mControlPoints;
00057                         int mControlPointCount;
00058 
00059                         NOISEPP_INLINE int clampValue (int i, int lo, int hi) const
00060                         {
00061                                 if (i < lo)
00062                                         return lo;
00063                                 else if (i > hi)
00064                                         return hi;
00065                                 else
00066                                         return i;
00067                         }
00068 
00069                         NOISEPP_INLINE Real mapValue (Real value) const
00070                         {
00071                                 int index;
00072                                 for (index=0;index<mControlPointCount;++index)
00073                                 {
00074                                         if (value < mControlPoints[index].inValue)
00075                                         {
00076                                                 break;
00077                                         }
00078                                 }
00079 
00080                                 const int index0 = clampValue (index-2, 0, mControlPointCount-1);
00081                                 const int index1 = clampValue (index-1, 0, mControlPointCount-1);
00082                                 const int index2 = clampValue (index, 0, mControlPointCount-1);
00083                                 const int index3 = clampValue (index+1, 0, mControlPointCount-1);
00084 
00085                                 if (index1 == index2)
00086                                 {
00087                                         return mControlPoints[index1].outValue;
00088                                 }
00089 
00090                                 const Real in0 = mControlPoints[index1].inValue;
00091                                 const Real in1 = mControlPoints[index2].inValue;
00092                                 const Real a = (value - in0) / (in1 - in0);
00093                                 return Math::InterpCubic (mControlPoints[index0].outValue, mControlPoints[index1].outValue, mControlPoints[index2].outValue, mControlPoints[index3].outValue, a);
00094                         }
00095                 public:
00096                         CurveElementBase (const Pipeline<PipelineElement> *pipe, ElementID element, CurveControlPoint *points, int count) : mElement(element), mControlPoints(points), mControlPointCount(count)
00097                         {
00098                                 NoiseAssert (points != NULL, points);
00099                                 NoiseAssert (count >= 4, count);
00100                                 mElementPtr = pipe->getElement (mElement);
00101                         }
00102                         virtual ~CurveElementBase ()
00103                         {
00104                                 delete[] mControlPoints;
00105                                 mControlPoints = NULL;
00106                         }
00107         };
00108 
00109         class CurveElement1D : public CurveElementBase<PipelineElement1D>
00110         {
00111                 public:
00112                         CurveElement1D (const Pipeline1D *pipe, ElementID element, CurveControlPoint *points, int count) : CurveElementBase<PipelineElement1D>(pipe, element, points, count)
00113                         {
00114                         }
00115                         virtual Real getValue (Real x, Cache *cache) const
00116                         {
00117                                 Real value;
00118                                 value = getElementValue (mElementPtr, mElement, x, cache);
00119                                 return CurveElementBase<PipelineElement1D>::mapValue(value);
00120                         }
00121         };
00122 
00123         class CurveElement2D : public CurveElementBase<PipelineElement2D>
00124         {
00125                 public:
00126                         CurveElement2D (const Pipeline2D *pipe, ElementID element, CurveControlPoint *points, int count) : CurveElementBase<PipelineElement2D>(pipe, element, points, count)
00127                         {
00128                         }
00129                         virtual Real getValue (Real x, Real y, Cache *cache) const
00130                         {
00131                                 Real value;
00132                                 value = getElementValue (mElementPtr, mElement, x, y, cache);
00133                                 return CurveElementBase<PipelineElement2D>::mapValue(value);
00134                         }
00135         };
00136 
00137         class CurveElement3D : public CurveElementBase<PipelineElement3D>
00138         {
00139                 public:
00140                         CurveElement3D (const Pipeline3D *pipe, ElementID element, CurveControlPoint *points, int count) : CurveElementBase<PipelineElement3D>(pipe, element, points, count)
00141                         {
00142                         }
00143                         virtual Real getValue (Real x, Real y, Real z, Cache *cache) const
00144                         {
00145                                 Real value;
00146                                 value = getElementValue (mElementPtr, mElement, x, y, z, cache);
00147                                 return CurveElementBase<PipelineElement3D>::mapValue(value);
00148                         }
00149         };
00150 
00154         class CurveModule : public Module
00155         {
00156                 private:
00157                         CurveControlPointVector mControlPoints;
00158 
00159                 public:
00161                         CurveModule() : Module(1)
00162                         {
00163                         }
00165                         void addControlPoint (Real inValue, Real outValue)
00166                         {
00167                                 CurveControlPoint point;
00168                                 point.inValue = inValue;
00169                                 point.outValue = outValue;
00170                                 mControlPoints.push_back (point);
00171                                 std::sort (mControlPoints.begin(), mControlPoints.end());
00172                         }
00174                         void clearControlPoints ()
00175                         {
00176                                 mControlPoints.clear ();
00177                         }
00179                         CurveControlPointVector &getControlPoints ()
00180                         {
00181                                 return mControlPoints;
00182                         }
00184                         ElementID addToPipeline (Pipeline1D *pipe) const
00185                         {
00186                                 NoiseModuleCheckSourceModules;
00187                                 ElementID first = getSourceModule(0)->addToPipeline(pipe);
00188                                 int count = (int)mControlPoints.size ();
00189                                 NoiseAssert (count >= 4, count);
00190                                 CurveControlPoint *points = new CurveControlPoint[count];
00191                                 for (int i=0;i<count;++i)
00192                                 {
00193                                         points[i] = mControlPoints[i];
00194                                 }
00195                                 return pipe->addElement (this, new CurveElement1D(pipe, first, points, count));
00196                         }
00198                         ElementID addToPipeline (Pipeline2D *pipe) const
00199                         {
00200                                 NoiseModuleCheckSourceModules;
00201                                 ElementID first = getSourceModule(0)->addToPipeline(pipe);
00202                                 int count = (int)mControlPoints.size ();
00203                                 NoiseAssert (count >= 4, count);
00204                                 CurveControlPoint *points = new CurveControlPoint[count];
00205                                 for (int i=0;i<count;++i)
00206                                 {
00207                                         points[i] = mControlPoints[i];
00208                                 }
00209                                 return pipe->addElement (this, new CurveElement2D(pipe, first, points, count));
00210                         }
00212                         ElementID addToPipeline (Pipeline3D *pipe) const
00213                         {
00214                                 NoiseModuleCheckSourceModules;
00215                                 ElementID first = getSourceModule(0)->addToPipeline(pipe);
00216                                 int count = (int)mControlPoints.size ();
00217                                 NoiseAssert (count >= 4, count);
00218                                 CurveControlPoint *points = new CurveControlPoint[count];
00219                                 for (int i=0;i<count;++i)
00220                                 {
00221                                         points[i] = mControlPoints[i];
00222                                 }
00223                                 return pipe->addElement (this, new CurveElement3D(pipe, first, points, count));
00224                         }
00226                         ModuleTypeId getType() const { return MODULE_CURVE; }
00227 #if NOISEPP_ENABLE_UTILS
00229                         virtual void write (utils::OutStream &stream) const;
00231                         virtual void read (utils::InStream &stream);
00232 #endif
00233         };
00234 };
00235 
00236 #endif
